actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: To permit a State which has completed its portion of the Interstate System to use funds from the Highway Trust Fund for urban mass transportation projects, and to increase the Federal share of the cost of such project.

summary.text: Permits the Governor of a State which has completed its portion of the Interstate System to elect to use funds from the Highway Trust Fund for urban mass transportation projects. Sets forth the procedures for such election. Increases to 90% (previously 2/3) the percentage of the Federal share for the cost of specified urban mass transportation system projects.

titles.title: To permit a State which has completed its portion of the Interstate System to use funds from the Highway Trust Fund for urban mass transportation projects, and to increase the Federal share of the cost of such project.
